summary: This is an email chain from March 3, 2021, between a U.S. Attorney's Office prosecutor and French individuals regarding scheduling a call for the ongoing SDNY investigation into Jeffrey Epstein and the prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell. The prosecutor seeks to speak with Nicolas Cassart and Nicolas Boulay.

persons.name: Nicolas Cassart
persons.context: French individual whom the SDNY prosecutors are attempting to schedule a call with regarding the Epstein/Maxwell investigation. He proposes a meeting time and requests a Teams invitation.

persons.name: Nicolas Boulay
persons.context: Copied on the email chain, identified as the partner of Nicolas Cassart, and noted as being available for the proposed call with SDNY prosecutors.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the subject of the ongoing federal investigation being conducted by the SDNY.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as the subject of the ongoing federal prosecution being handled by the SDNY.

connections.description: Referred to as partners in the context of being contacted by the SDNY for the investigation.
Cassart is being contacted by prosecutors as part of their investigation into Epstein.
Cassart is being contacted by prosecutors as part of their prosecution of Maxwell.

events.title: Email scheduling for SDNY investigation call
events.description: Email correspondence to schedule a call between SDNY prosecutors and French individuals Nicolas Cassart and Nicolas Boulay regarding the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.

keyFacts: As of March 2021, the SDNY was actively conducting an investigation into Jeffrey Epstein and a prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell.
SDNY prosecutors sought to interview French individuals Nicolas Cassart and Nicolas Boulay in connection with this investigation.
The communication indicates international investigative reach, contacting individuals in a different time zone (proposing 17:00 'our time').
The document is a scheduling email, revealing ongoing investigative activity but not the specific substance of the information sought.
